wikitext.*:
'''''alda''''' is a noun meaning "tree" in [[Quenya]].<ref name="Names">{{App|Letters}}, Note, ''The names of the letters''</ref>  The genitive plural is ''aldaron''.<ref>{{RGEO|Namarie}}</ref>  Compare with ''[[galadh]]'' in [[Sindarin]].

[[Image:Alda.gif|left]]''Alda'' is also the name in Quenya of the twenty-eighth letter of the [[Tengwar]] alphabet.<ref name="Names"/>  In written Quenya ''Alda'' is used for '''LD'''.  In other modes this letter represents voiceless '''L''' (or '''LH''').<ref>{{App|Letters}}, Note, ''The additional letters''</ref>  The Westron name for this letter is '''''Lhó'''''.<ref>See ''[[Alphabet of Fëanor: Numenian, or Westron, Mode]]''</ref>

<!-- An extra blank line is inserted to prevent the Etymology section title from indenting -->
==Etymology==
The word derives from the [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] [[GALÁD]].<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}},  GALÁD -</ref>

==Cognates==
*[[Telerin]] ''[[galla]]''
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[galadh]]''

==See also==
* ''[[Aldamir]]'' = "Bejeweled Tree"
* ''[[Tar-Aldarion|Aldarion]]'' = "Son of the Trees"
* ''[[Oromë#Etymology|Aldaron]]''
* [http://www.uib.no/People/hnohf/qlist.htm Quenya Corpus Wordlist] edited by [[Helge Fauskanger]]
